paragraphs.body: I recently found out a site that has DVD screenshots for all episodes, including the super deformed ones, and they don't have a logo on it. We could easily replace all the images which have the Avatar Spirit logo on it, and the 316 onwards that we have in bad quality. Anyone's up to checking Iroh.org? Omnibender - Talk 21:26, 4 September 2008 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I recently found out a site that has DVD screenshots for all episodes, including the super deformed ones, and they don't have a logo on it. paragraphs.body: With the recent MW software upgrade, all images now have the prefix "File:". Don't freak out! :P On articles, you can still insert images with the old [[Image:]] coding, and the old coding does not need to be replaced. Just a note... The 888th Avatar (Talk) 13:39, 23 April 2009 (UTC)
